languages.text: [Выпить залпом бокал амасека] "Повысим ставки! Стрелять будем во хмелю!"

traits.locale_text: [Выпить залпом стакан амасека] "Я покажу тебе, как нужно развлекаться. Повысим ставки!"

languages.text: [Toss back a glass of amasec] "Let's raise the stakes! We're going to shoot while drunk!"

languages.text: [アマセックのグラスをあおる]「もっと面白くしよう！酔っぱらって撃つんだ！」
languages.original_text: [Toss back a glass of amasec] "Let's raise the stakes! We're going to shoot while drunk!"

traits.locale_text: [アマセックのグラスをあおる]「もっと面白くしよう！酔っぱらって撃つんだ！」

languages.text: [Bir bardak amaseki tek yudumda iç] "Çıtayı yükseltiyorum! Sarhoşken ateş edeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: [Toss back a glass of amasec] "Let's raise the stakes! We're going to shoot while drunk!"

traits.locale_text: [Bir bardak amaseki tek yudumda iç] "Çıtayı yükseltiyorum! Sarhoşken ateş edeceğiz!"

languages.text: [Alzar una copa de amasec] «¡Vamos a subir las apuestas! ¡Dispararemos borrachos!».
languages.original_text: [Toss back a glass of amasec] "Let's raise the stakes! We're going to shoot while drunk!"

traits.locale_text: [Alzar una copa de amasec] «¡Vamos a subir las apuestas! ¡Dispararemos borrachos!».

languages.text: [丢给索罗蒙一瓶艾玛赛克酒]“不如来点更难的吧！在喝了酒的情况下比比看吧！”
languages.original_text: [Toss back a glass of amasec] "Let's raise the stakes! We're going to shoot while drunk!"

traits.locale_text: [丢给索罗蒙一瓶艾玛赛克酒]“不如来点更难的吧！在喝了酒的情况下比比看吧！”

languages.text: [Servir un nouveau verre d'amasec] « Corsons un peu les choses ! Nous allons tirer tout en nous saoulant ! »
languages.original_text: [Toss back a glass of amasec] "Let's raise the stakes! We're going to shoot while drunk!"

traits.locale_text: [Servir un nouveau verre d'amasec] « Corsons un peu les choses ! Nous allons tirer tout en nous saoulant ! »

languages.text: [Ein Glas Amasec trinken] "Erhöhen wir den Einsatz! Wir schießen betrunken!"
languages.original_text: [Toss back a glass of amasec] "Let's raise the stakes! We're going to shoot while drunk!"

traits.locale_text: [Ein Glas Amasec trinken] "Erhöhen wir den Einsatz! Wir schießen betrunken!"
